about_the_game:
All the music for the game in one package.
Experience the eerie sounds, melancholic melodies and oppressive atmospheres of Session Seven whenever, wherever you want.
detailed_description:
All the music for the game in one package.
Experience the eerie sounds, melancholic melodies and oppressive atmospheres of Session Seven whenever, wherever you want.
name: Session Seven Soundtrack
reviews:
“I have had the chance to listen a couple times to dPoten's soundtrack for the game Session Seven. The music adheres to a thrilling atmosphere, which works great for the game. Although the music sometimes is a bit too present at times in the game, it definitely puts the player in this puzzling environment. The music doesn't get boring, but instead wants to be heard multiple times, which is important for game music. As a personal favorite I would pick "I Was Terrified", but every track is well composed and worth a listen.”
ZenithMusicNet
short_description: Enjoy the music of Session Seven on your own. Composed by Damian Potenzoni at D-CHord studios.
